attributes.action: take Education out of party politics.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our Education system has been bombarded with too many ill-thought-out reforms from Ministers of Education for far too long.    It is time to stop.

Education is too important to us, to our children and to the future of this country to be used as another issue in party politics.

In the national interest, put the education of our children in the hands of an independent body, one that has all party agreement, run by people qualified in education, with experience and expertise in Nurseries, Schools and classrooms, Colleges and Universities.
